items.sentence: You\'re the tallest boy in our class, aren\'t you?
You\'re three years younger than Tom, aren\'t you?
The longer you wait, the worse it\'s going to get.
You should tell Tom that Mary is going to do that.
Tom told me that he didn\'t like living in Boston.
Tom watered the tree that he\'d just transplanted.
I think I wouldn\'t enjoy playing tennis with Tom.
Tom didn\'t expect to hear back from Mary so soon.
It doesn\'t look like you guys are having any fun.
What kind of things does Tom do that irritate you?
Tom wasn\'t in the mood to accept Mary\'s apology.
I thought you knew Tom was going to be here today.
Tom wanted Mary and John to go to Boston with him.
Tom wanted Mary to understand why he had to leave.
Tom says he\'ll be sticking around for a few days.
Would you go back to Boston if you had the chance?
Tom loves himself more than he loves anybody else.
It seems like Tom doesn\'t really want to do this.
Tom has been unemployed for the past three months.
Tom has had so many chances to do the right thing.
